subject: Re: [junit] JUnit and Ant: stack trace filtering
msgSnippet: ... What are you expecting it to do?  Which kind of output would you want it to generate? ... I don t think that we ve changed anything in that area since the
messageBody:
On Thu, 06 Dec 2001, Mark Derricutt <mark@...> wrote:

> I've just started using it, and one of my tests failed (I knew it
> would). But, Ant never told me which test failed, it said which
> TestCase failed, but not the actual test.

What are you expecting it to do? Which kind of output would you want
it to generate?

> Mmmm, or maybe I should check out a recent cvs version first and see
> if its already fixed....

I don't think that we've changed anything in that area since the
release of 1.4.1.

Cheers

Stefan
